author: hlship
msg: Split URL generation into a new service: tapestry.url.LinkFactory.
Remove AbstractService; its behaviors are now supplied by LinkFactory and by the static methods on ServiceUtils.

author: hlship
msg: Convert AssetExternalizer into a true HiveMind service.

author: hlship
msg: Change the IEngineService interface to pass a single untyped parameter object, allowing each service to define for itself what data is needed.

author: hlship
msg: Add ability to easily initialize properties of instances created by the Creator.

author: hlship
msg: Simplify Creator by making use the existing class enhancement subsystem.
